General.Name: Aviv Arlon Ltd
General.Description: Aviv Arlon Ltd. focuses on the acquisition, improvement, development, leasing, and management of commercial real estate in the United States and Serbia. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.
